name: 4 Puzzle
description:
Addictive puzzle game!
Solve 193 original job to 9 levels !!
Rules of the game: The game board is four squares, which depicts the image-figure.
Puzzles will be moved so that there was visible only given combination of shapes.
  On the first and second level puzzles are not rotated.
  On the third level puzzles revolve.
The total number of combinations of location puzzles-6144 !!
Found only one

Video: http://youtu.be/KbhI5tzhu_g
Program is written on "smart BASIC" for iOS programming language and is published in App Store using "smart BASIC" SDK for Xcode.
